member.name: DML_SCALE_BIAS
member.summary: Contains the values of scale and bias terms supplied to a DirectML operator. Scale and bias have the effect of applying the function g(x) = x * Scale + Bias.

member.name: DML_SCALE_BIAS.Scale
member.summary: The scale term in g(x) = x * Scale + Bias.

member.name: DML_SCALE_BIAS.Bias
member.summary: The bias term in g(x) = x * Scale + Bias.
